wizardStep2DataController.sftpStep2Header: 2. Identify the remote path using the browser (or check to manually specify)
wizardStep2DataController.sftpStep3Header: 3. Specify the mask defining the file for processing
wizardStep2DataController.sftpFileMaskTooltip:
The Prefix and Suffix can include wildcards ? and *
A ? represents any one alphanumeric character including underscore and hyphen.
A * represents one or more alphanumeric characters including underscore and hyphen.
wizardStep2DataController.sftpStep4Header: 4. Retrieve a sample file to continue job definition

wizardStep4MapController.errorListPrefixMaxLength: List Prefix cannot be greater than 20 characters
wizardStep4MapController.selectDataMapTypeLabel: 4. Select how you would like to map the data
wizardStep4MapController.selectDataMapTypeHelp: Facts are data about your business processes; these are your transactions, purchases, and similar. Dimensions are data about your business entities; these are your customers, retail items, and similar.
wizardStep4MapController.selectDataLoadTypeLabel: 5. Select how the data should be loaded
wizardStep4MapController.selectDataLoadTypeFactHelp: Append will add the data from the incoming file to {0} records already in the database. Overwrite will replace the existing {0} records in the database.
wizardStep4MapController.selectDataLoadTypeDimensionHelp: Update and Insert will update preexisting records with data from the incoming file and insert records that don't already exist. Overwrite will empty the {0} table and insert all valid records from the incoming file.
wizardStep4MapController.keyMappingHelp: Match the identifying fields from the incoming file to the {0} table.
wizardStep4MapController.inputKeyHelp: Select the identifying field from the incoming file.
